attributes.action: Put the cost of tax of fuel down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was Exposed in the sun that without tax fuel would atleast be 52 p, we pay more in money for fuel then other european countries. i want the cost of fuel to go down while everything else moneywise continues to rise

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
